DataElement.preferredName: Cytogenetic Analysis Laboratory Procedure Metaphase Process Count Performed Finding Status Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information related to the status of the cytogenetic analysis metaphase count finding.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cytogenetic Analysis Laboratory Procedure Metaphase Process Count Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Techniques for analysis of chromosomal and subchromosomal properties and structures, such as those to diagnose, classify, screen for, or manage genetic diseases and abnormalities._Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._The second phase of mitosis, in which the chromosomes line up across the equatorial plane of the spindle prior to separation._To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity._Executed and carried through to completion.
